title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: IMO Regulations for safety; ILLC, SOLAS etc. - Rules for bulk Carriers-Grain loading - Rules for liquid cargo carriers - double hull tanks, segregation of tanks, tank- cleaning, special equipment; Rules of carriage of chemicals at sea; Rules for fire fighting appliance, life saving appliances, light and general signals; Rules of prevention of collision at sea; Ballast water management- Structural Safety and Role of Classification Societies; Safety Management and ISM certification
